content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today? Are you looking to schedule plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Yeah, I need a plumber. Got a leak in my basement.
Of course! I can help you with that. Can I have your name to get started?
Thank you, James! Could you please provide the address where the service is needed?
Great, thanks! Let me quickly check if your address is within our service area.
I'm having trouble verifying your service area right now. I'm going to connect you to a human specialist to assist further. Please hold on a moment.
reason: Agent unable to verify service area due to system error

content: Hi James, this is Sarah from XYZ Home Services. I'm stepping in to help. I see you need plumbing for a leak at 1700 Meadowview Court, Springfield. We do cover that area. Let’s get you scheduled! What day and time works best for you?
Tomorrow morning if you got it.
Thanks, James. We can book you for tomorrow at 9am. Please confirm and I’ll get you on the schedule.
All set! Our plumber will arrive tomorrow at 9am at 1700 Meadowview Court. You’ll get a reminder later today. If you need anything else, just reply here. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services!
